content: for the heel for a different texture row 1 single_crochet into 20 stitches 20 row2 decrease single_crochet into next 16 stitches decrease 18 row 3 decrease single_crochet into next 14 stitches decrease 16 row 4 decrease single_crochet into next 12 stitches decrease 14 row 5 decrease single_crochet into next 10 stitches decrease 12 row 6 decrease single_crochet into next 8 stitches decrease 10 row 7 decrease single_crochet into next 6 stitches decrease 8 row 8 decrease single_crochet into next 4 stitches decrease 6 row 9 decrease single_crochet into next 2 stitches decrease 4 row 10 decrease decrease 2 upper continuing in rounds for upper part of stocking round 34 1 single_crochet into the stitch below and into each stitch *along the side of the heel single_crochet into next 20 stitches and then work 1 single_crochet into each stitch *along remaining side of heel 1 single_crochet in last stitch 40 rounds 35-68 single_crochet into each stitch below 40 hanging loop chain 14 turn and slip_stitch in each chain slip_stitch through end into the base to create loop tie off make an extra knot if your loop doesn t feel secure and weave ends
